overview:
Adam Willhoeft is a digital media marketing consultant, social media strategist and an online reputation specialist. He works with C-level executives to plan, design, build and manage successful digital strategies. His outside-the-box approach delivers innovation and results to the clients he works for.

Skills and Experience Summary (2012)

• 7 yrs. experience, with specific to digital/social media strategies and digital media buying • 4 yrs. experience in a project manager role • Bought and optimized over $25,000,000+ in ad inventory for online campaigns • Managed annual advertising budgets over $12,000,000+ • Performance Driven – it all comes down to ROI • Strong ability to influence key stakeholders and related decisions • Ability to lead, work autonomously and collaboratively in a fast-paced team environment delivering top quality results with a positive demeanor • Strong history in managing client relationships and expectations • Adapts to change quickly

Project Management

• Proficient in the direct management of cross-functional production teams o Managed a team of 8 (media buyers, designers, developers, and network engineers) o Managed up to 15 agencies/networks at one time to deliver against the same goal • Managed complex multi-disciplinary project teams through all phases of the project life cycle, providing leadership, coaching, and training to achieve aggressive targets o Evaluated deliverables to ensure the work met requirements and maintained a high level of quality • Fluent with the use of project management tools and methodologies. o Advanced skills in Microsoft Project, Microsoft Office, and Visio • Ability to think “outside the box” and contribute to the improvement of internal processes • Managed digital marketing budgets using ROI reporting/forecasting through monitoring, data and statistical analysis o Tracked and analyzed the performance of digital marketing campaigns in order to recommend ways to optimize programs that deliver value and surpass objectives. • Strong analytical and problem solving skills

Digital Media Buying (Web|Mobile|Social|Video|Email)

• Google Adwords certified • I’ve personally bought and optimized over $25,000,000+ in online ad inventory for campaigns o P&L accountability and competitive against KPI’s o Optimized and analyzed results of purchased media in order to maximize revenue opportunities, and reach campaign objectives  Conducted A/B and multivariate testing to optimize landing pages • Expertise in performance branding and digital strategies in national and international markets o Developed online brand strategies and ensured consistent messaging across all customer/consumer touch points • Acquired web and mobile inventory in RTB from all the major DSPs and ad exchanges with the help of DMPs on a CPA, CPC and CPM basis o Ability to manage complex negotiations to successful closure and delivery o Handled the tasks of generating insertion orders, sending out creative, and confirming ad space and tracked the delivery of all purchased media o Increased client cookie pools up to 100x • Experience with ad serving platforms (Mediaplex, Zedo, Doubleclick, Sitescout, ADTech, Atlas)* • Relationships with all the media representatives within all the top advertising and mobile networks • High proficiency in Excel for reporting and analysis • Analyzed user behavior using web analytics tools (Google Analytics, Clicktale, Omniture, Prosper202)
